name: JMeterInstaller
description: Find in cache or download a specific version of JMeter and prepend it to the PATH
author: Alexandre Gattiker

inputs.name: jmeterVersion
inputs.label: Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: The version of JMeter which should be installed on the agent if not already present

outputVariables.name: jmeterLocation
outputVariables.description: The location of the jmeter binary that was installed on the agent.

messages.InputVersionNotValidSemanticVersion: Input version %s is not a valid semantic version
messages.JMeterNotFoundInFolder: JMeter executable not found in path %s
messages.JMeterDownloadFailed: Failed to download JMeter from url %s. Error %s
